<p>The Poll is up!  The Poll is up!  Tell all your friends, the poll is up! Check <a href="https://furrypoll.com">here</a>!</p>
<figure id="attachment_2307" style="float: center" width="604"><img class="wp-image-2307 size-large" src="{{ site.baseurl }}/assets/mandi-interview-small-randomwolf-1024x936.jpg" alt="No pressure! (Art by Grey)" width="604" height="552" /><figcaption> No pressure! (Art by Grey)</figcaption></figure>
<p>That's right, it's time once again for the furry survey, the fandom's largest marketing survey.  Completing the survey helps to give us a more complete picture of the furry fandom, because otherwise, it's just some critters writing about themselves.  Remember, you can take the survey once per year!  If you've got a few minutes to spare, take some time to fill out the 2016 Furry Poll.</p>
<p>The poll is up <a href="https://furrypoll.com">here</a>!</p>
